message: Ebooks are here and there, How do you organize your ebooks folders,..etc? What reader do you like? Do you use Kindle or any e-reader devices?

data.message:
If I need to organize a book into a folder, it means I probably won't read it, and best bit is ensuring its name and maybe ISBN are in file/folder-name so that they are searchable later if my priorities change.
I use Kindle on PC and Android. On PC I also use Acrobat Reader, and on Android I use the default PDF Reader for PDFs and Kindle for the other format it can read (mobi? Can't remember). All I need in a reader on mobile is something that can zoom  (or reflow text, like Kindle), and remember read position.

Tip: if you download a file from Internet on your Android device, opening it from Downloads won't maintain opening position, but if you save it somewhere or navigate to it using the file explorer, programs that save reading position will be able to do so to the file(
I use SumatraPDF for ebooks reading. I don't spend a lot of time organizing books. I use Everything Search Engine to search my machine.
